name: Hold Space to Fart
description:
(Wait a short moment for the game to load.)

Welcome to the vernissage!
Everything is prepared, but the food is not enough.
Hinder the visitors from eating too much.

Luckily, you have your unconventional weapon always with you: Fart away!

Move with A and D or Arrow Keys. Hold Space to gather farting power, release for... release. See to it that there is still food left when the time runs out.

@talecrafter
